statusHistory.description: Crew actively operating under Doflamingo's command

keyMoments.title: Donquixote Pirates Officers Revealed
keyMoments.description: Multiple officers of the Donquixote Pirates are shown together at Dressrosa Palace, revealing the size and organization of Doflamingo's crew.
keyMoments.significance: First major appearance showing the full scope of the Donquixote Pirates organization and their various officers.

keyMoments.title: Crew Members Dispatched to Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo sends Baby 5 and Buffalo to Punk Hazard as reinforcements.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Doflamingo's active command of his crew and their deployment to protect his interests.

goals: Protect SAD production and Caesar Clown
trivia: The crew includes a high-ranking Marine Vice Admiral (Vergo) as an undercover agent
Multiple crew members debuted in Episode 608 simultaneously
